channel.title: How do I add commands like ::dragon, ::money, and on
channel.description: i have no idea how to do that lol :|

item.title: How do I add commands like ::dragon, ::money, and on
item.dc:creator: @domo9122 domo9122
item.description:
@domo9122 wrote:

Find the tutorial in the list but you could always just put this with your commands

else if (command.startsWith("dragon") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(3140,1); addItem(4087,1); addItem(4585,1); addItem(1149,1); addItem(1187,1); addItem(1377,1); addItem(775,1); addItem(4131,1); addItem(4151,1); addItem(6570,1); addItem(6585,1); }

Try my tutorial i have made one in the tutorial section…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add commands like ::dragon, ::money, and on

item.title: How do I add commands like ::dragon, ::money, and on
item.dc:creator: @Roderick50 Roderick50
item.description:
@Roderick50 wrote:

Im using a Testscape source

Go to client.java and search for basicrunes
above that add something like this
(you can copy and paste this and change it)

} else if (command.startsWith("sweet") && playerRights >= 3) { addItem(4708,1); addItem(4755, 1); addItem(4087, 1); addItem(1000, 1); addItem(0995, 1000000); addItem(0500, 111111);]

The ‘sweet’ part you can change to what ever you want your command to be
The player rights part you can change to who you want to be able to use it
That one is at 3 meaning only admins can use it.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
